reviews.author: Sarah M.
reviews.text: Very warm & welcoming with amazing decoration and a very friendly atmosphere. The hot chocolate is absolutely divine!

reviews.author: Marco K.
reviews.text: This cute little place looks as sweet as the chocolate specialties they offer. The churros with Spanish hot chocolate are a must-try!

reviews.author: Anna L.
reviews.text: The dark chocolate hot chocolate is highly praised. They also have amazing vegan options with mint and orange flavors!
